text: Saves a template file of stored display states
You can save a file that can be loaded with
which stores the display flag state of current /obj level nodes.  This makes it very easy to switch on/off certain items for a variety of use cases, together with
Set as Viewport Camera with State
allows you to quickly change the visibility of items for specific camera views.

title: Save /obj Display State
summary: Saves a template file of stored display states
